QuestData.Title: Supplies from Darkshire
QuestData.Description: Oh, what is a poor old man to do? I need some supplies from Darkshire, but the village is so far away and I am so old and feeble...I would never make the trip.$B$BCan you go to Darkshire and bring me back some ghost hair thread? You can get it from Madame Eva at her home on the Darkshire square.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Madame Eva in Darkshire.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, ghost hair thread is what you need, is it? I'm afraid I have none in stock, but I can make some for you...if you can supply the ghost hair.
